item.title: How to Fix Linux Perl LC_ALL_ERROR
item.author: Author
item.description: How to fix perl LC_ALL ERROR 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 export LANGUAGE=en_US.UTF-8 export LANG=en_US.UTF-8 export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 cat >> /etc/environment <<EOF LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 LANG=en_US.UTF-8 EOF
